alert.note: Alert for Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued May 18 at 1:36PM MDT until May 19 at 3:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 3 PM MDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected in the mountains. Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts to 60 mph in the Lander Foothills. * WHERE...Wind River Mountains East and Lander Foothills. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 3 PM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Elevated blowover risk, especially for light and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. Use caution if you must drive. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Lander Foothills; Wind River Mountains East
